text: Antonín Barák (born 11 July 1956) is a Czech rowing coxswain. He competed in the men's coxed four event at the 1980 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1956 births Category:Living people Category:Czech male rowers Category:Olympic rowers of Czechoslovakia Category:Rowers at the 1980 Summer Olympics Category:Sportspeople from Brno Category:Coxswains (rowing)
title: Antonín Barák (rowing)
